00025 class WrappedType;
00026 
00027 class Shuttle {
00028  public:
00029    // constructors and destructors
00030    Shuttle();
00031    virtual ~Shuttle() {}
00032       
00033  public:
00034    bool mbStoreInClient;
00035    wxString mValueString;
00036    // Even though virtual, mostly the transfer functions won't change
00037    // for special kinds of archive.
00038    virtual bool TransferBool( const wxString & Name, bool & bValue, const bool & bDefault );
00039    virtual bool TransferFloat( const wxString & Name, float & fValue, const float &fDefault );
00040    virtual bool TransferDouble( const wxString & Name, double & dValue, const double &dDefault );
00041    virtual bool TransferInt( const wxString & Name, int & iValue, const int &iDefault );
00042    virtual bool TransferInt( const wxString & Name, wxLongLong_t & iValue, const wxLongLong_t &iDefault );
00043    virtual bool TransferLongLong( const wxString & Name, wxLongLong_t & iValue, const wxLongLong_t &iDefault );
00044    virtual bool TransferString( const wxString & Name, wxString & strValue, const wxString &strDefault );
00045    virtual bool TransferEnum( const wxString & Name, int & iValue, 
00046       const int nChoices, const wxString * pFirstStr);
00047    virtual bool TransferWrappedType( const wxString & Name, WrappedType & W );
00048    // We expect the ExchangeWithMaster function to change from one type of
00049    // archive to another.
00050    virtual bool ExchangeWithMaster(const wxString & Name);
00051 };
